content: coastline hexie baby blanket pattern *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/coastlinesunbursthexiebabyblanket this listing is for those who wish to have an advertisement free pattern or printable copy i truly hope you enjoy this relaxing make it s based on the original coastline sunburst hexie blanket pattern i released last year-but with a twist i ve included half hexies for the top and bottom of this baby blanket for a really finished look with a smaller selection of colours no colour changes and motifs that are packable this project promises to be the bring-a-long staple join them all up later with a continuous join as you go for hexagons and you ve got yourself the perfect project to ring in the summer with happy crocheting l m this pattern is worked up using the large sunburst hexagon the pattern uses wecrochet knit picks comfy worsted 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 109yds/50g and a 5mm hook size h pattern includes all colours used and the yarn quantities as well as exact positioning for all 3 colour combos shown in the photos my gift to you is taking the work out of colourwork the final blanket size was approximately 37 x 48 inches pattern will include - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours/colour legend - additional colour charts/ yarn recommendations with links - stitch glossary - printable pdf of blanket graph - full colour chart of all hexies and their positioning so you can make this exact colour copy - full written instruction for the hexagon and half hexagon used large sunburst hexie - video tutorials for the hexie/half hexie as well as the continuous join as you go method cjayg and jayg - written and video tutorial for border happy crocheting everyone l m ***this pattern is written in english only***
